EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Workshops_Q216.Notification - Change of Venue - Chica
EmailTemplate.subject: NEW VENUE - Cloud Native Workshop - Chicago
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/nj]]>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Cloud Native Workshop in Chicago!
Due to popularity, we are moving this workshop to a larger space in the EMC office, which is only 2 blocks from the Pivotal office (0.3 of a mile).
Below you will find the new address:
EMC 353 North Clark St Floor 19 Room TR-106 - WINDY CITY A Chicago, IL 60654
Same date, same time:
Tuesday, March 29th
9:00am to 12:00pm
Event Website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/chicago]]>
We apologize for any inconveniences this may cause.
Please email Jignesh Sheth at jsheth@pivotal.io <[[mailto:jsheth@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
